xBIowQ0WaR8.author: NetworkChuck
xBIowQ0WaR8.description:
Now you can deploy and run your own hyper-secure file sharing platform, by downloading FileCloud‚Äôs Community Edition. Visit https://ntck.co/filecloud and download FileCloud Community Edition as a self-hosted solution, on your Windows or Linux servers or preferred IaaS provider (AWS, Azure). (no code required) 


In this video, NetworkChuck will walk you through how to create your own cloud, either at home, on-prem or in the cloud! NetworkChuck demos the setup of FileCloud and Nextcloud, two excellent dropbox, google drive and microsoft one drive replacements. These are great options for both personal and business.
